name: $::type
desc: Returns: The kind of specimen conditioned for testing expected by lab.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The kind of specimen conditioned for testing expected by lab.

name: $preference
desc: Returns: The preference for this type of conditioned specimen.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The preference for this type of conditioned specimen.

name: $requirement
desc: Returns: Requirements for delivery and special handling of this kind of conditioned specimen.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Requirements for delivery and special handling of this kind of conditioned specimen.

name: $retentionTime
desc: Returns: The usual time that a specimen of this kind is retained after the ordered tests are completed, for the purpose of additional testing.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The usual time that a specimen of this kind is retained after the ordered tests are completed, for the purpose of additional testing.

name: $rejectionCriterion
desc: Returns: Criterion for rejection of the specimen in its container by the laboratory.

name: $addrejectionCriterion
desc: Criterion for rejection of the specimen in its container by the laboratory.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Criterion for rejection of the specimen in its container by the laboratory.

name: $handling
desc: Returns: Set of instructions for preservation/transport of the specimen at a defined temperature interval, prior the testing process.

name: $addhandling
desc: Set of instructions for preservation/transport of the specimen at a defined temperature interval, prior the testing process.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Set of instructions for preservation/transport of the specimen at a defined temperature interval, prior the testing process.
